properties.displayName: System Network Connections Discovery Via Net.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ((ProcessCommandLine endswith " use" or ProcessCommandLine endswith " sessions") or (ProcessCommandLine contains " use " or ProcessCommandLine contains " sessions ")) and ((FolderPath endswith "\\net.exe" or FolderPath endswith "\\net1.exe") or (ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName in~ ("net.exe", "net1.exe")))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Adversaries may attempt to get a listing of network connections to or from the compromised system they are currently accessing or from remote systems by querying for information over the netwo
